abstractText: This Nepalese palm-leaf manuscript, written during the reign of the king Abhayamalla (1216-1235), contains Kuladatta's (ca. 12th c.) commentary on the Kriyāsaṃgraha, a Buddhist ritual manual. This is one of the manuscripts used by Tanemura in his 2004 critical edition of selected chapters of this work.
